aka: 永不沉没：消失的日本战舰
trans_title: 永不沉没：失落的日本战列舰
永不沉没：消失的日本战舰
introduction: October 24, 1944, the world's greatest battle at sea begins in the Philippines. Japan's navy gambles on a decisive victory against the United States to turn the tide of World War II. Instead Musashi, its top secret super battleship, ends up at the bottom of the ocean. How did this unsinkable giant go down so fast? Was it overwhelming American air power? Or a fatal design flaw? ...
chinese_title: 永不沉没：失落的日本战列舰
